segments.text: There will be another sandstorm here tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's the fourth one this year . Isn't it horrible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . We should plant more trees and grass to stop the sand from spreading .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It may take many years for the trees to grow . I hope people will stop cutting down trees .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But we can't destroy our forests to get the wood .
segments.speaker: S2
